mapper.select: select uid ,pwd,name,gender,birth,is_lunar,cphone,email,habit,regdate from member where UID = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(UID, PWD, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, IS_LUNAR, CPHONE, EMAIL, HABIT, REGDATE) VALUS(#{UID}, #{PWD}, #{NAME}, #{GENDER}, #{BIRTH}, #{IS_LUNAR}, #{EMAIL}, #{HABIT}, SYSDATE)
